reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's hot pink color and appreciate its fit, noting it's not oversized and sits below the waist. The material receives positive feedback for being super soft and substantial, with one customer comparing it to cotton candy. They find it comfortable, well-weighted, and appreciate the buttons on the sleeves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest purchase of 2025!!!!
items.body: Most perfect top I have purchased in a while. Soft, fits great( m) and the buttons are everything!!! I struggled to choose a color, they are all pretty. I went with the taupe/ beige. Fits well tts. I'm 5'5 135 lbs Read more
items.author: B Bee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect to wear to the office
items.body: Love this sweater. I am 5'5" and 117 pounds and ordered a small. It is perfect to wear to the office with a pair of dress pants or a skirt. The burgandy color was very vibrant. It is fitted but not too tight. Good quality and I may just order it in another color. Read more
items.author: Katie L.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Sweater to Add to Your Wadrobe
items.body: Super cute sweater, especially with the button detail on the sleeves! Its closely knitted fabric is very substantial, making it a little heavier than most sweaters. It’ll be great for colder weather. I suggest following the size guidelines. I ordered the White M instead of the S, but the M is too big for my 5’2”-130 frame. I will enjoy wearing this sweater during the fall & winter seasons. Read more
items.author: KelleyF

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, but fits very skinny.
items.body: Beautiful fabric. Soft. Nice details in the buttons on sleeve. However, it is a very slim silhouette fit, in the arms and the body. The length is perfect, but if you aren't built like the model you will definitely want to size up. Basically it fits like a snug undershirt. I have found this with Anrabess before. Nice quality, small sizing. Read more
items.author: kelly m. watts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Warm
items.body: Super soft. Will probably be warm (it's still too warm where I live so I haven't worn it yet). The fit is great other than sleeves are a little long but I am petite so I expected that. Actually looks cute with the sleeves cuffed. Read more
items.author: Traci M Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True fit
items.body: Great fit, color, and comfortable! Can dress up or wear casual! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too much Sweater
items.body: Pretty color but large. My height is 5'2" and weight is 120 lbs. Size small too loose and boxy. Do not mind moderate oversizing, but this just looked sloppy. Lightweight sweater and easy to tuck in. Returned Read more
items.author: Blondie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Button Detail
items.body: Great fit and fabric. I love the button detail on the wrists. True to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Deep Red, Black, Camel, Coffee, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Almond, Pink, White, Bright Plum Red, Dark Purple, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
